briefTitle: Effect of Concomitant Radiotherapy and Trastuzumab on Cardiotoxicity of Patients Treated for Early Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of Concomitant Radiotherapy and Trastuzumab on Cardiotoxicity of Patients Treated for Early Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: difference in LVEF (Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early breast cancer patients,treated adjuvantly with radiotherapy of the operated breast or thoracic wall and treated concomitantly with trastuzumab.
* Reviewed many months after treatment, without recurrence of disease.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Recurrence of disease
